errors.suggestedFix: Check OCR accuracy or video clarity
Improve caption readability (safe margins, pacing, density) and re-render

Move captions inward from screen edges (increase padding / safe area)
Reduce words per caption and keep captions to 1–2 lines
Fix punctuation in script/transcript normalization and re-render captions

the others and you can imagine as many
birds as you like.

his hands out to help Isabel up. 4
